title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 20 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<abusenius\_> has quit  
01:21 <cjd\_> has joined #xwiki  
01:21 <cjd> has quit  
11:00 <abusenius\_> has joined #xwiki

12:35 <cjd\_> is now known as <cjd>  
13:00 <vmassol> has quit  
16:58 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
17:18 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:22 <DarkKnightCZ> vmassol: Hi, got a second? I've created XWIKI-12923 and i've come with two possible solutions. Personally I would go with second solution as it's more flexible. If it doesn't sound to you as an unnecessary thing, i will implement it and propose PR. Thanks  
17:25 <vmassol> Hi DarkKnightCZ sorry I'm on holidays ATM don't have much time. Looks good. Enygma would be the best person to validate since he's the one who created the realtime watchlist but he's on holidays too ATM. You could do a first PR doing what you think is best IMO  
17:25 <vmassol> thanks!  
17:25 <DarkKnightCZ> vmassol: yup, that's okay for me, thanks for your time... enjoy holidays :)  
17:26 <vmassol> thx
